TopicTitle: Help me choose my new Kerbol system look

Articles.Content:
I'm starting a new career, and wanted to play around with different options for the skybox and sunflare. I've got it down to the 2 options posted:

1. Nebula Skybox + Blue Sunflare: gives it a neat look, feels very different, but I like it.

Milky Way + White Sunflare: a classic look, but spruced up, feels comfortable.

What do you guys think? I'm still not sure which one to go for, and would love to hear your input. 

Apologies if this is not the best spot to post this kind of thing. Feel free to move the post to the correct forum section.
I'm partial to the more realistic skybox but I play with a scaled down RSS install mostly so that goes with the setting there, depends on what feel you want for the game.

Of these two, nebula. It's so calm. But I would also choose deep star skybox (or whatever it's called) the one with tons of stars. It flickers nicely when moving the camera around.

About the sunflare, blue feels like it would belong to a neutron star or blue giant. Kerbol is supposed to be a main sequence star so I'd go for yellowish white if anything.
